text: [Tāmen] duì nǐmen [wéi ān lā zhī dào juānzhù] shì lìnsè de. Dāng kǒngjù jiànglín [tāmen] shí, nǐ jiāng kànjiàn tāmen wàngzhe nǐ, tāmen de yǎnjīng zhuǎndòng dé hǎoxiàng chǔyú sǐwáng biānyuán de rén yīyàng. Dāng kǒngjù [cóng tāmen] xiāoshī shí, tāmen biàn yǐ jiānkè dehuà lái gōngjí nǐmen, tāmen [duì wéi ān lā zhī dào shīshě qiáncái] shì lìnsè de. Zhèxiē rén bìng wèi xìnyǎng, suǒyǐ, ān lā yǐ shǐ tāmen de shàngōng túláo, zhè duì ān lā shì róngyì de.
